title: 5 snowdown tokens off K/DA Akali Prestige Edition
body:
Yo Riot,

What's the chances of you guys adding 5 snowdown token points to my account just so I can get  K/DA Akali Prestige Edition skin? I'm literally at 1795 points :(

Thanks

replies.body: Yikes. Looks like you can afford a whole bunch of chests now ;)
